question: I'm a leaseholder, occupier and I own a share of the freehold. Which option do I need on the home page?
answer: Obviously, more than one of these options can apply to you. Pick the option that is most relevant to what you are trying to do. (e.g. If you're a leaseholder who owns a share of the freehold and you'd like to make modifications to your flat select 'Leaseholders')

question: Do we own the freehold yet?
I'd like to extend my lease
answer: If you'd like to extend your lease please contact us at lease-extension@latonstreet.co.uk
